text: Hey there, I reached out to the team that owns the video player. We’re gonna fix this issue  across the board for everyone. I can’t state a timeline just yet as this just got on the team’s radar.
to answer if you can access the markup, only via JS, so not in a great way.
Is there any documentation around that? We need to be compliant by end of year, so would like to fix by then one way or another :slightly_smiling_face:
Well. I can’t make a promise right now but based on what I’m hearing from product, we may have it solved for you before the end of the year.
